name: Potaroma Dog Puzzle Toy 2 Levels, Slow Feeder, Pup Food Treat Feeding Dispenser for IQ Training and Entertainment for All Breeds 4.2 Inch Height
short_description: 2 Levels in 1 Toy: start your pups off with a level 1 puzzle, add some treats in the base compartments and watch your dogs get their tasty reward by nudging the lids. For dogs who have mastered level 1, for added challenge in level 2, just put some treats in the top compartments, teach your dogs to press the top cover to dispense treats down into the base compartments and finally enjoy their reward

Slow Feeder: The large capacity top transparent granary saves you the hassle to refill dog food frequently. The product can also be used as a slow feeder utensil for your dogs, which promotes healthy ingestion by slowing down eating speed by over 10x. Great for large and small dogs
Not Easy to Tip Over: 4 non-slip rubber mats and weighted base hold the dog puzzle toy firmly in place when dogs eat and nudge and prevent the toy from tipping over

We Prioritize Safety: the dog puzzle toys are designed with your pet’s health in mind, made of durable food-grade PP materials. Non-removeable parts make it safe and easy to clean. And you can give puzzles toy to your dog or directly out of the box, just no assembly!!

Trains Dog’s Intelligence: interactive treat puzzle game challenges your puppies to get their reward of treats, works your dog's mind while reducing boredom and destructive behavior like chewing, digging and excessive barking. Size: 4.2 inch height

name: Interactive Dog Puzzle Toy for Smart, Dog Enrichment Toys to Keep Them Busy, Cognitive Dogs Toy to Stimulate Their Brain, Dog's Treat Dispensing Toys with Slow Feeder, Durable and Easy to Clean
short_description: Multifunctional Interactive Dog Puzzle Toy: This dog puzzles for smart dogs features functions such as slow feeder, mental stimulation, alleviating separation anxiety, and keep them busy.It is a dog enrichment toys suitable for both indoor and outdoor use. Additionally, this cognitive dog toys can also be used for dog training, stimulating their minds and enhancing their interactivity, to maximize the dog's daily exercise needs

Adjustable Food Treat Dispensing Dog Toys: This cognitive dog toys adopts the concept of combining food exploration and rewards. Because of its capacity there is no need to reload food repeatedly, which can save you a lot of time, The dog makes the food leak out by means of scooping, rolling, etc. on this interactive dog enrichment toys. The size of the food bite can be adjusted through the paddle to control the length of the eating time. And in this process, awaken the dog's nature to actively chase after food and keep them busy

Innovative Enrichment Toys for Dogs Design: This interactive dog toys consists of four parts. The transparent arc-shaped upper cover is made of high-quality ABS material. The interior has a three-layer spiral and valve structure. The bottom is inspired by the design shape of a tire, which is convenient for dogs to grasp and enhances playability. It is made of tough food-grade silicone material. The material is safe and reliable for dogs. In terms of color matching, it adopts colors that dogs like to combine, enhancing its appeal to them and increasing their sense of pleasure during use. For dog-owning families, this is an indispensable gift for your dog

How to Use Enrichment Toys for Dogs: This Puzzle dog toy is very easy to use. Just put your dog's favorite snacks,When you first start using it, you need to guide your dog to use it. Of course, dogs with particularly high intelligence can skip this step dog food and other foods through the feeding port. Your dog can see the food through the transparent barn-style upper cover, which stimulates their desire to eat. While eating and playing, this dog enrichment toy stimulates their intelligence and hunting instincts,Also, when your dog is busy, you can save time to do housework or work, or even have a cup of coffee, etc

Cleaning and Precautions: This dog puzzle toy can be disassembled and cleaned. It is suggested that the transparent part is facing the face when it is disassembled, and the rubber base should be gently rotated clockwise until it is opened. The internal parts of the rotation can be removed one by one, which is easy to remove and can be washed in a dishwasher or by hand. Note: This dog enrichment toys is suitable for dogs to play with and extend their playtime. However, it is not recommended that dogs chew it for a long time as it is not a chewable toy. In the early stage, the owner needs to supervise and guide them to use it correctly

Have any questions about the product,we can solve it. Our customer service team is also a pet care expert, happy to provide you with professional advice and timely help. What we sell is not only toys, but also the bond of joy and trust between you and your beloved dog. Buy with confidence and witness every excited tail wagging of your beloved dog! Tip:If your dog is a "powerful chewer", This product may not be suitable for him/her

name: KADTC 5 Levels of Step-by-Step Challenge - 6 Ways to Play - U.S. Brand & Design - Extra-Large Size Beginner to Expert Dog Puzzle Toy for Smart Dogs Hard Puzzles Puppy Difficult Mental Stimulation Toys
short_description: [World’s First & Only 5-in-1 Expert Dog Puzzle Toy] Meet KADTC’s patented all-in-one challenge system—the world’s first and only dog puzzle built with 6 gameplay modes and 5 progressive difficulty levels. From Level 1 (Beginner) to Level 5 (Expert), it keeps play fresh with a structured way for dogs to learn, solve, and level up through rewarding challenges.

[Long-Lasting Mental Enrichment for Busy, Curious Dogs] Keep your dog engaged by channeling energy into productive problem-solving. This interactive dog puzzle encourages focus and helps prevent boredom by offering deeper mental stimulation than ordinary toys—great for puppies, smart breeds, and dogs that love a challenge.

[Extra-Large Size + Food-Grade ABS, Built for Daily Use] Crafted from high-strength food-grade ABS, free of BPA, PVC, and phthalates. The XL footprint fits a wide range of dogs—from small pups to large breeds—while the durable, scratch-resistant build is made for repeated play sessions and multi-dog homes.

[Ready to Use + Illustrated Guide & Video Tips Included] No assembly required—start playing right out of the box. Designed with integrated parts and no small detachable pieces for safer play. Includes a step-by-step illustrated manual plus video tips to help you introduce each level smoothly and keep the experience rewarding.

[Gift-Ready + Trusted U.S. Brand Support via Amazon] A premium gift for dog birthdays, holidays, and everyday enrichment. As a U.S. brand dedicated to pet innovation, KADTC stands behind every product. If it’s not the right fit for your dog’s play style, enjoy hassle-free returns through Amazon for added peace of mind.

name: Outward Hound by Nina Ottosson Dog Tornado – Interactive Treat Puzzle Enrichment Toy, 3 Spinning Layers, Level 2 Intermediate
short_description: Dog Puzzle Toy – Level 2 Intermediate: Perfect for beginners or smart pups, this Nina Ottosson dog puzzle offers a fun, interactive challenge
Boredom Buster: 15 minutes of brain-engaging play equals 30 minutes of physical activity, giving dogs of all ages the exercise they crave
Engaging Puzzle Play: Keeps pets entertained while encouraging problem-solving and interactive play
Multiple Ways to Play: Pick up bones and spin layers to find hidden treats; Tips and Tricks included to adjust difficulty
Mealtime Fun & Slow Feeding: Holds 1/2 cup of kibble or treats; doubles as a slow feeder to help slow down fast eaters and make mealtime more engaging
product_description: The Nina Ottosson by Outward Hound Dog Tornado interactive dog puzzle is a fun way to enrich your dog's playtime and get them excited about problem-solving games! This Level 2 Intermediate dog puzzle keeps dogs busy with mentally stimulating treat challenges that activate your dog's senses and tap into their natural instincts to hunt and forage for food. As a result, our dog enrichment toys provide mental and physical exercise, help relieve stress, and reduce boredom for happier, healthier pups. Great for small, medium, and large dogs, the Dog Tornado features three tiers with twelve treat-hiding compartments you can fill with your pup's favorite dog treats to motivate them to solve the puzzle. Watch your dog use their brain to sniff out the treats, then spin the layers to uncover hidden rewards! Since all dogs are unique, you can vary the level of difficulty of this dog food puzzle to meet your dog's problem-solving ability, with multiple ways to make it easier or harder for your pet – three bone treat compartment covers are included to increase the challenge! Moreover, this dog treat puzzle is easy to clean and made from food safe materials that are BPA, PVC, lead, and phthalate-free for your convenience and peace of mind.

Directions PLAY BY THE RULES – SAFETY & CARE: When choosing a toy, make sure to choose an appropriate size/style/level for your dog. No toy or game is indestructible. ALWAYS supervise your dog closely, teach your dog how the game/toy works. Do not leave the dog alone with a treat game/toy, do not let the dog chew on the game/toy or pieces. Inspect regularly for damage and remove if broken, or if parts become separated, as serious injury may result. For dogs only, not a children's toy. When empty, store until next supervised use.

This Level 2 Intermediate dog puzzle keeps dogs busy with mentally stimulating treat challenges that activate your dog's senses and tap into their natural instincts to hunt and forage for food.
